content: Chao Peng Home Publications Teaching Students Grants Portfolio Chao Peng (彭超) Associate Professor School of Interactive Games and Media Rochester Institute of Technology Office: MAGIC Spell Studios (MSS) 3162 (where is it?) Phone: (585) 475-7385 Email: cxpigm@rit.edu Bio: I am an Associate Professor of the School of Interactive Games and Media (SIGM) in the Golisano College of Computing and Information Sciences (GCCIS) at RIT. I am also a Resident Faculty of the RIT Center for Media, Arts, Games, Interaction & Creativity (MAGIC). My areas in computing are high performance graphics, video game development, GPU-accelerated parallel computing, big data visualization, virtual reality, and 3D interaction. I am also an artist working on various kinds of digital art, including digital paintings, 3D models, 2D & 3D animated shorts, games, and other interactive arts. I received my PhD and MS in Computer Science from Virginia Tech, my MFA in Computer Art from University of Alaska Fairbanks, and my BArch in Architectural Design (buildings) from Hebei University of Engineering, China.
